page.title: 07LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: There are approximately 26 industries in our area,some of them are factories. Here are some of them: Granta Press Garages Electricians Builders Coalmerchants Bakery Carpenter Garment Repairs Smokery. There is a factory called Chrystal Structures Ltd.which makes models of atoms and does research into rock crystals,eg:moonrocks. Morley Engineering in Quy makes vacuum equipment and does research into metal fatigue.The only industry in Little Wilbraham is a lady who makes dolls house furniture, The primary industry for the area is farming.
